page.title: 20VILLAGE CHARITIES
page.content: There are three village charities:- 1)Fordham Memorial Hall. Funds for this are raised by various money- raising functions. From it the village Hall is maintained & run. 2)Therfield & Kelshall Educational Foundation.Funds for this come from money,invested in Unit Trust Bonds, from the sale of the village school to the local Education Authority.The beneficiaries are village students in Further Education. 3)The Boteman Charity.Funds for this are obtained from the rental of plots of agricultural land bequeathed for this purpose. The beneficiaries are inhabitants over 70 years old and widows.
